document_data.name: Haldred Moss
document_data.mainbody: '''Haldred Moss''' was a [[peat]] farmer that lived on a farm in the [[Twilight Marsh]] of the [[Moonsea North]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite adventurers league/Defiance in Phlan|11}}
document_data.Relationships: He was married to his intrepid wife named [[Millivent Moss|Millivent]], and together they had four children: daughters [[Alleena Moss|Alleena]] and [[Kithian Moss|Kithian]], sons [[Quayle Moss|Quayle]] and [[Volland Moss|Volland]], and an infant named [[Bo Moss|Bo]].
document_data.History: Some time during the 1480s [[DR]],{{ToD-time}} the Moss family farm was attacked by goblins from the [[Foulwater]] tribe and only Millivent and Bo managed to escape. While it was not entirely clear exactly what happened to Haldred and the rest of the children, it appeared as if they were taken captive rather than killed outright.
